resources.string: The Foggy Space was formed in 2017. All of our partners are interested in producing of qualitative Ukrainian e-liquid. Nowadays there are many offers for vape-customers, but we hope that our product will show our clients something new in vaping.

The Foggy Space offers our customers highly organized service. We are ready to help you with your questions. Our specialists will help in solution your troubles with choosing of devices or e-liquids, some dairy problems with vape are easy for us. We are always happy to communicate with you.
Our mission is helping beginners in vaping use only qualitative e-liquids and devices. The purpose is populating vaping in Ukraine and CIS.

There is really easy system of delivering your goods. We cooperate with Nova Poshta, if you made the order in workday, it would be delivered during 2 days. If it is comfortable for you, you can pay for your order with your cash-card with terminal or app of the bank on your mobile device.
Although we have not so big line of e-liquids(only 4 tastes), we try focus on the tastes really carefully, also it is more easy for you to choose your own favorite taste!
